comcraft_ai.title: AI Assistant
comcraft_ai.subtitle: Configure the persona, safeguards, and server knowledge for your AI moderator.

memories.title: Memory log
memories.description: {count, plural, one {# stored memory} other {# stored memories}}
memories.empty: No memories stored yet. Start chatting with the AI and important events will appear here.
memories.toastDeletedDescription: The selected entry has been deleted.

usage.title: Usage & quota
usage.description: Monitor how many AI tokens this guild has spent this month.
usage.noData: No usage recorded for this period yet.
usage.limitReachedDescription: The AI quota has been reached. It resets on {reset}. Upgrade your tier to unlock more capacity.
usage.historyDescription: Recent AI tasks executed by this guild.
usage.historyEmpty: No usage logs yet. Start using the AI assistant to see activity here.

featureDisabled.title: AI assistant is disabled
featureDisabled.description: Upgrade this guildâ€™s tier to unlock the AI assistant feature.

persona.title: Persona & tone
persona.description: Define how the AI introduces itself and which tone of voice it should use when responding inside your server.
persona.assistantNameHelp: Shown in dashboards and internal logs. The Discord bot name is managed separately.
persona.systemPlaceholder: You are ComCraft AI, the helpful assistant for the {guild} community. You answer questions using the knowledge base and stay friendly yet concise...
persona.systemHelp: Provide background instructions that are prepended to every AI request. You can use {assistant} and {guild} placeholders. Keep it short and factual (max 6000 characters).
persona.stylePlaceholder: Always greet members by name. Mention server-specific terminology. If you are unsure, tell the user you will escalate it to staff...
persona.styleHelp: Tone-of-voice notes that help the AI match your communityâ€™s vibe. {assistant} and {guild} placeholders are supported (max 6000 characters).

settings.title: Permissions & providers
settings.description: Choose which AI capabilities are active. Model selection is managed centrally.
settings.allowQuestionsHelp: Allow members with access to run the slash command inside Discord.
settings.allowModerationHelp: Allow the bot to run automated moderation checks via the dashboard or future automations.
settings.defaultProviderHelp: Choose which AI provider to use by default. Claude is required for web search.
settings.aiChatHelp: Allow members to chat with the AI in a dedicated Discord channel without slash commands.
settings.aiChatChannelHelp: Members can talk to the AI in this channel. Pick a text channel.
settings.aiChatThreadsHelp: Start a new thread for each member conversation to keep channels tidy.
settings.memoryHelp: Store important events and facts so the AI can remember what happens on the server.
settings.memoryMaxEntriesHelp: Older or low-importance memories are pruned when this limit is exceeded.
settings.memoryRetentionHelp: Memories older than this number of days are removed automatically.
settings.webSearchHelp: Allow the AI to fetch fresh information via Claudeâ€™s built-in web search tool. Uses extra tokens.
settings.webSearchRequiresClaude: Select Claude as the default provider to enable web search.

documents.title: Knowledge base
documents.description: Add short notes, FAQs, and server policies that the AI may quote from when answering members.
documents.newPlaceholderContent: Paste rules, onboarding steps, giveaway policiesâ€¦
documents.empty: No knowledge entries yet. Add your first note to guide the AI.

loadError.title: Could not load AI settings
loadError.description: Refresh the page or try again later.

saved.title: Changes saved
saved.description: Your AI configuration has been updated.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: Please try again or contact support.

validation.title: Missing information

comcraft_giveaways.title: Giveaways
comcraft_giveaways.subtitle: Launch and track your server giveaways from one place.

preview.defaultFooter: Click the button below to enter!

dialog.title: Start a new giveaway
dialog.description: Set the prize, duration and access rules. The bot will post it instantly.

fields.joinButtonHelp: Leave empty for the default "ðŸŽ‰ Join" label.
fields.rewardRoleHelp: 0 keeps the role permanently. Max 43200 minutes (30 days).
fields.rewardDmPlaceholder: Congrats! Use this code to claim your prizeâ€¦

featureDisabled.title: Giveaways are disabled
featureDisabled.description: Upgrade this guildâ€™s subscription tier to unlock giveaway automation.

recurring.title: Recurring giveaways
recurring.description: The bot starts a new giveaway automatically at your chosen interval (e.g. daily or weekly).
recurring.empty: No recurring giveaways yet. Add one above.
recurring.hint: First run starts soon after you add; then the bot repeats at the interval you set.

toastCreated.title: Recurring giveaway added
toastCreated.description: The bot will start the first run soon and then repeat at your interval.

sections.activeDescription: Monitor running giveaways and close them early if needed.
sections.activeEmpty: No active giveaways at the moment.
sections.endedDescription: Review winners and reroll if you need new results.
sections.embedOptionsDescription: Style the giveaway card with your own title, colors and media.
sections.rewardOptionsDescription: Grant roles, send follow-up messages and customize winner DMs.

loadError.title: Could not load giveaways
loadError.description: Refresh the page or try again later.

featureDisabled.description: Giveaways are disabled for this guildâ€™s tier.

validation.prize: Enter a prize for the giveaway.
validation.channel: Select a channel where the bot can post.
validation.ctaLabel: Provide a label when adding a link button.
validation.rewardChannel: Select a channel for the reward announcement.
validation.rewardRoleDuration: Role removal must be between 0 and 43200 minutes.

started.title: Giveaway started
started.description: The bot posted the giveaway in the selected channel.

error.title: Something went wrong

auto_kick_inactive.title: Auto Kick Inactive Members
auto_kick_inactive.description: Automatically kick members who have not sent a message (or joined without activity) for a set number of days
auto_kick_inactive.inactivity_days_hint: Members with no message activity (or who never sent a message) for this many days will be kicked. The bot runs this check every 6 hours.
auto_kick_inactive.grace_days_hint: Auto-kick only starts after this many days, so the bot can collect activity first. You can set 1â€“30 days.
auto_kick_inactive.toast_saved: Auto kick inactive members settings have been updated.
auto_kick_inactive.no_kicks_yet: No members have been kicked yet. The log will appear here after the first run.
